name: The Anglerfish Project
summary: Drifting through the lonely abyss of space, Pádraig must use his lifetime of experience of fishing the earthen oceans to help The Foundation catch and decipher communication packages that conceal themselves in the cosmos. "We help the people" is their motto, but is that their goal? Thankfully Pádraig has someone he can talk to — a makeshift decoding probe called Paul.
